nodes.text: Kellogg's C-3PO's commercial was a TV commercial made by the company Kellogg's in 1984, to promote the C-3PO's cereal.

C-3PO, holding a metal case, and R2-D2 are traversing a small desert plain while dodging laser fire. The screen cuts to a starship soaring in space towards a planet. Aboard are C-3PO and R2-D2, who have just finished making a cereal that they name C-3PO's. The screen then cuts to space, where two rings of the cereal fuse to form an "8" shape. A human real-life boy is then shown eating the cereal, followed by a suggestion of how to complement the cereal with your breakfast. The screen cuts back to the desert planet in a cave, where C-3PO has delivered the cereal to a pleased patron. The commercial ends with the slogan "A New Force at Breakfast" followed by C-3PO saying "May the Force be with you."
The commercial stars actor Anthony Daniels as C-3PO. The creature in the cave was based on an unused design from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
An in-universe version of C-3PO's cereal appeared in the picture book Darth Vader and Son.
